column4: Hi boys, I am looking for a way to create a link to a website as a file on my desktop. Is there a way to do that? I used to drag and drop the sphere off the URL on Opera or Chromium. It used to work but not anymore. Any suggestions please?
Create a launcher to the command "xdg-open your_url"
I guess, but then again that's just a command, you can create a launcher for it
